item.title: Nobel Season: A Summary of the Prizes for 2018
item.author: Lucy Rowlands,
item.description: Last week was Nobel Prize season, and whilst it’s not quite as glamorous as the Oscars, it comes with a lot of prestige and a chance to go down in history. These yearly prizes are awarded to those who make significant contributions in several categories outlined in the will of Alfred Nobel, with the …

item.title: Zombie cells
item.author: Lucy Rowlands,
item.description: The zombies are here, except turns out it’s on a cellular scale, so stop boarding up your windows and pick up that microscope! In new research from Dr Baker at the Mayo Clinic, scientists found that removing senescent cells, also known as ‘zombie’ cells, reduced symptoms associated with age related …

item.title: Exam stress? Time to cure your fear of spiders
item.author: Lucy Rowlands,
item.description: Is the end of term getting you all stressed out? The latest research suggests now may also be the perfect time to tackle that fear of spiders…yes, you heard right – spiders! A new study from Professor Oliver Wolf at Ruhr-University Bochum has shown stress can increase extinction learning, which …
